title: Shattered Hand
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ability-con=Con% and %ability-str=Str% %ability-damage=damage%. Hand useless %until-healed=until healed%

title: Rattled
text: Normal damage and target is %status-confused=confused% for 1d3 rounds (%save-critical=Fort negates%)

title: Thunder Strike
text: Double damage and target is %status-deafened=deafened% for 1d4 rounds

title: Lights Out
text: Normal damage and target is %status-blinded=blinded% for 1d3 rounds

title: Crushed Trachea
text: Normal damage and target cannot breathe or speak DC 20 Heal check ends condition

title: Split Open
text: Double damage and 1d4 %status-bleed=bleed%

title: Feeble Parry
text: Double damage and target is disarmed (1 item)

title: Surprise Opening
text: Double damage and one free attack against the target with a -5 penalty

title: Back Breaker
text: Double damage and 1d6 %ability-dex=Dex% %ability-damage=damage%

title: Terrible Bruise
text: Double damage and 2d6 nonlethal damage

title: Broken Leg
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ability-con=Con% and %ability-dex=Dex% %ability-damage=damage%. Target's speeds are reduced by half %until-healed=until healed%

title: Spun Around
text: Normal damage and target is %status-flat-footed=flat-footed% for 1 round

title: Where Am I?
text: Normal damage and target is %status-stunned=stunned% for 1 round

title: To Your Thinky Bits
text: Double damage and 1 %ability-int=Int% %status-bleed=bleed% (%save-critical=Fort negates save each round%)

title: Crunch
text: Double damage and target is %status-nauseated=nauseated% for 1 round (%save-critical=Fort negates%)

title: Armor Dent
text: Double damage and 2d6 damage to metal armor (ignore hardness)

title: Breathless
text: Normal damage and target is %status-exhausted=exhausted% for 1d4 rounds

title: Mace to da Face
text: Normal damage and target %status-dazed=dazed% and %status-blinded=blinded% for 1 round

title: Tiring Blow
text: Double damage plus target is %status-fatigued=fatigued%

title: Concussion
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ability-int=Int% and %ability-wis=Wis% %ability-damage=damage%

title: Ruptured Spleen
text: Normal damage and 1d6 %status-bleed=bleed%. This bleed can only be cured with magic

title: Solid Blow
text: Triple damage

title: Crumpling Blow
text: Double damage and target is knocked %status-prone=prone%

title: Collapsed Lung
text: Normal damage and target is %status-staggered=staggered% for 1d6 rounds

title: Flat Foot
text: Double damage and 1 %ability-dex=Dex% %ability-damage=damage% and target's speeds are reduced by 5 feet %until-healed=until healed%

title: Skull Crush
text: Double damage and 2d6 %ability-int=Int% %ability-drain=drain% (%save-critical=Fort half%)

title: And Stay Down!
text: Normal damage and target is knocked %status-prone=prone% and %status-stunned=stunned% for 1 round (%save-critical=Fort negates% stun)

title: Bone Masher
text: Normal damage and either 1d3 %ability-dex=Dex% %ability-damage=damage% and halve speed (leg) or 1d3 %ability-str=Str% %ability-damage=damage% (arm). Limb useless %until-healed=until healed%

title: 2 for 1
text: Double damage to target and normal damage to adjacent target

title: Crushed Intestines
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ability-con=Con% %status-bleed=bleed% (DC 15 Fort negates, save each round)

title: Numbing Blow
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ability-dex=Dex% %ability-damage=damage% and target is disarmed (1 item, %save-critical=Reflex negates% drop)

title: Roundhouse
text: Normal damage and a free attack against adjacent foes at the same bonus

title: Staggering Blow
text: Normal damage and double nonlethal damage

title: My Teef!
text: Normal damage and 1 %ability-con=Con% %ability-damage=damage%. Target loses bite, gains 20% spell failure chance for verbal spells

title: Earth Rumble
text: Normal damage and a free trip attempt versus target and all adjacent enemies

title: Pimp Slap
text: Normal damage and target %status-dazed=dazed% for 1d4 rounds

title: Cracked Rib
text: Normal damage and 1d3 %ability-con=Con% %ability-damage=damage% and target is %status-fatigued=fatigued%

title: Box the Ears
text: Normal damage and target %status-deafened=deafened% for 1d4 hours

title: Bell Ringer
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ability-int=Int% %ability-damage=damage% and %status-sickened=sickened% for 1d4 rounds

title: Momentum
text: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round

title: Broken nose
text: Normal damage and 1 %ability-cha=Cha% %ability-damage=damage% and 1 %status-bleed=bleed%

title: Broken Ribs
text: Double damage and target cannot heal naturally for 1d4 days

title: Knockback
text: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away

title: Low Blow
text: Normal damage and target is %status-sickened=sickened% for 1d6 rounds

title: Brained
text: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round

title: Shield Smack
text: Double damage and target's shield is disarmed

title: I See Stars
text: Normal damage and target takes a 20% miss chance for 1d4 rounds

title: Nighty Night
text: Normal damage and target is %status-unconscious=unconscious% for 1d4 rounds (%save-critical=Fort negates%)

title: Cracked Knee
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ability-dex=Dex% %ability-damage=damage%. Target's base land speed reduced to 10 feet %until-healed=until healed%

title: What's Going On?
text: Double damage and 1d4 hours of target's memory erased

title: Crushed Toe
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ability-dex=Dex% %ability-damage=damage%. Target's land speed is halved %until-healed=until healed%

title: Off Balance
text: Normal damage and target provokes attacks of opportunity from all threatening opponents
